basics.name: Joe Oliveira
basics.label: 永遠の痛み
basics.summary: Gameplay-focused designer and systems programmer specializing in balancing combat systems, player analytics, and scalable technical solutions. Led design and implementation on multiple student projects, demonstrating proven ability in rapid prototyping, iterative development, and cross-functional collaboration.

interests.name: Exploring the outdoors: From hiking trails to camping under the stars, I love connecting with nature and recharging in the open air.
Rock Climbing: Testing limits and building resilience, one climb at a time. (Ask me about my back!)
Music Enthusiast: Whether it’s feeling every beat or discovering new genres, music fuels my creativity.
Culinary Adventures: Cooking and baking are my outlets for creativity, and I’m always experimenting with new recipes.
Gaming: Both playing and creating games—constantly inspired by the worlds, mechanics, and stories within. Especially now that I am forwarding myself into the gaming industry!
Cinema Lover: I’m a movie buff at heart, always ready to dive into everything from indie films to big blockbusters.
Foodie: Exploring new cuisines and flavors is my kind of adventure.
Seeking New Challenges: Life’s too short not to push the boundaries—whether it’s learning, creating, or exploring.
